H0.text: Who directed the 1966 film 'A Countess from Hong Kong. Charlie Chaplin

H1.text: Who directed the 1966 film 'A Countess from Hong Kong. Billy Wilder

H2.text: Who directed the 1966 film 'A Countess from Hong Kong. Stanley Kubrick

H3.text: Who directed the 1966 film 'A Countess from Hong Kong. Chaplinian

A4.text: Chaplin was deeply hurt by the negative reaction to the film, which turned out to be his last.

A5.text: he began work on A Countess from Hong Kong (1967), a romantic comedy based on a script he had written for Paulette Goddard in the 1930s.
